name: Damsel a Day
description:
Our dastardly villain is not very creative.. Every day he steals our poor maiden, and ties her to train tracks! It’s up to you to reach her before the train does!

But the loop continues..

Over..

And over..

How long can you keep this up before finally failing?

---

Use the array keys to move, that’s all there is to it. Oh, and maybe it's best to avoid the train yourself!

Good luck!

---

Created for Ludum Dare 47, which theme was "Stuck in a loop". It was created using TIC-80 and Fennel

---

Also, here's the music!
